newsletter.title: Subscribe to get the latest news and rates
newsletter.text: Do you love maritime transport as much as we do? Whether it's exciting stories about our employees on land or at sea, reports on our customers from around the world or the latest information about our services: with our newsletter we always keep you up to date with the latest developments.

cotizador.title: Select your Modality
cotizador.subtitle: Choose the type of quote that best suits your shipping needs

aereo.title: Air
aereo.description: Air freight quotation with rates per kilogram in different weight ranges
aereo.comparisonDescription: Perfect for urgent shipments or high-value products. Guaranteed speed with competitive rates based on weight.

fcl.title: Maritime FCL
fcl.description: Full Container Load with rates per complete container (20GP, 40HQ, 40NOR)
fcl.description3: Delivery in longer times and lower cost
fcl.comparisonDescription: Ideal for large volumes. Exclusive container for maximum security and better cost per unit transported.

lcl.title: Maritime LCL
lcl.description: Less than Container Load with rates per maritime consolidation
lcl.comparisonDescription: Economic solution for medium volumes. Share container space optimizing costs without sacrificing quality.

QuoteAIR.title: Air Quote
QuoteAIR.subtitle: Generate quotes for air shipments
QuoteAIR.seleccionamejor: Select the best option for your shipment
QuoteAIR.ingresomanual: Enter the total weight and volume manually instead of per piece
QuoteAIR.info1: Length or width cannot exceed 3.0 m (300 cm). The cargo is considered oversize and must be quoted on a case-by-case basis with your executive
QuoteAIR.info2: Height cannot exceed 2.4 m (240 cm). Cargo exceeding this height is not suitable for air transport
QuoteAIR.cobropor: Charged based on the greater of:
QuoteAIR.ingresavalor: Enter the total value of your cargo
QuoteAIR.segurocargo: You must enter the value of the goods to calculate the insurance.
QuoteAIR.cotizaciongenerada: This only generates a quotation without creating an operation in the system. You will receive a PDF for your review. Ideal for comparing options!
QuoteAIR.operaciongenerada: Automatically creates an operation in the system and notifies your account executive. The shipping process starts here.
QuoteAIR.seleccionarruta: You must select a route before generating the quote
QuoteAIR.error: There was an error in the quotation.
QuoteAIR.generarpdf: The quotation PDF will be downloaded automatically in a few moments.
QuoteAIR.intenta: No routes available for the selected origin and destination.
QuoteAIR.limitemaximo: The system allows a maximum of 10 pieces per quote.
QuoteAIR.sobre10: For shipments with more than 10 pieces, please contact your account manager for a tailored review and quotation.
QuoteAIR.rutaanalisis: Case-by-case for this laneâ€”please share cargo details for a spot assessment.
QuoteAIR.comunicacioneje: Please contact your commercial representative to obtain a personalized quotation according to your cargo specifications.
QuoteAIR.oversize: The length and/or width exceeds 300 cm. This cargo is considered oversize and must be quoted on a case-by-case basis.
QuoteAIR.altura: The height exceeds 240 cm. This cargo cannot be handled via air transport.
QuoteAIR.alturasupera: The height exceeds 160 cm. This cargo requires cargo flights. Please check with your executive if the selected rate corresponds to cargo flights.

Pieceaccordionair.noapilableTooltip: Cargo that cannot have anything stacked on top of it

WeightRangeAlert.sinPrecioEnRango: No rate available for this weight range
WeightRangeAlert.pesoActualEnRango: Your current chargeable weight is {{peso}} kg, which falls in the {{rango}} range. This route has no pricing available for that range.
WeightRangeAlert.sugerencia: You need a minimum of {{pesoMinimo}} kg (range {{rangoSiguiente}}) to quote this route.
WeightRangeAlert.ajustarPeso: Adjust your cargo weight or select another route that has a rate for your current range.
WeightRangeAlert.sinRangoDisponible: No higher weight ranges are available for this route. Please contact your account executive.

Quotelcl.title: LCL Quote
Quotelcl.subtitle: Generate quotes for LCL shipments
Quotelcl.seleccionamejor: Select the best option for your shipment
Quotelcl.intenta: No routes available for the selected origin and destination.
Quotelcl.error: There was an error in the quotation.
Quotelcl.ingresavalor: Enter the total value of your cargo

Pieceaccordionlcl.noapilableTooltip: Cargo that cannot have anything stacked on top of it
Pieceaccordionlcl.inforuta: You must select a route before generating the quote
Pieceaccordionlcl.inforuta1: You must select an Incoterm before generating the quote
Pieceaccordionlcl.inforuta2: You must complete the Pickup and Delivery addresses for the EXW Incoterm
Pieceaccordionlcl.inforuta3: You must select a Package Type for all pieces before generating the quote
Pieceaccordionlcl.inforuta4: No route selected to generate PDF
Pieceaccordionlcl.segurocargo: You must enter the value of the goods to calculate the insurance
Pieceaccordionlcl.ingresoinco: You must select an Incoterm before generating the quote
Pieceaccordionlcl.debescompl: You must complete the Pickup and Delivery addresses for the EXW Incoterm

OversizeNotify.title: Quote requires special analysis
OversizeNotify.explanation: Your cargo has special characteristics that cannot be quoted automatically. A Seemann Group executive must review your request on a case-by-case basis to provide you with the best available rate.
OversizeNotify.fillFieldsReminder: Please complete all shipment details (origin, destination, dimensions and weight of the pieces) before notifying your executive. All the information you enter will be sent directly to your account executive.
OversizeNotify.sent: Your executive has been notified successfully! They will contact you shortly.
OversizeNotify.error: An error occurred while sending the notification. Please try again.
OversizeNotify.missingData: Complete at least the origin, destination and piece data to notify your executive.
OversizeNotify.reason_no-apta-aereo: Not suitable for air transport (height > 240 cm)
OversizeNotify.reason_oversize-maritimo: Maritime Oversize Cargo (exceeds container limits: L 1203 / W 234 / H 259 cm)

OversizeNotifyLCL.largoMsg: One or more pieces exceed 1203 cm in length. This cargo is considered oversize and requires a special quote.
OversizeNotifyLCL.anchoMsg: One or more pieces exceed 234 cm in width. This cargo is considered oversize and requires a special quote.
OversizeNotifyLCL.altoMsg: One or more pieces exceed 259 cm in height. This cargo is considered oversize and requires a special quote.

reportOperational.subtitle: Analysis of your shipping operations
reportOperational.emptySubtitle: You don't have any registered operations yet

reportFinancial.title: Financial Reporting
reportFinancial.forecastBasis: Based on average of last {{count}} months
reportFinancial.forecastNeedData: At least 2 months of data needed
reportFinancial.emptySubtitle: No invoices found for your account
reportFinancial.tokenError: Invalid or expired token. Get a new token from Postman.
reportFinancial.noTokenError: You must enter a token first
reportFinancial.alertOverdueText: Total overdue balance: CLP ${{amount}}. Review to avoid interest or blocks.
reportFinancial.alertDueSoonText: Schedule payments to avoid overdue status.
reportFinancial.alertConcentrationText: "{{name}}" accounts for {{pct}}% of total expense. Consider diversifying or negotiating rates.
reportFinancial.pdfFooter: Report generated by the Shipping Management System
reportFinancial.pdfPopupError: Please allow pop-ups to download the PDF
